Robot - Interface in gui
This interface specifies methods to operate a robot that is inside a maze at a particular location and looking in a particular direction.
Robot.Direction - Enum Class in gui
Describes all possible directions from the point of view of the robot, i.e., relative to its current forward position.
Robot.Turn - Enum Class in gui
Describes all possible turns that a robot can do when it rotates on the spot.
RobotDriver - Interface in gui
This interface specifies a robot driver that operates a robot to escape from a given maze.
rotate(Robot.Turn) - Method in class gui.ReliableRobot
This method turns ReliableRobot on the spot for 90 degrees in the direction provided within the parameter turn.
rotate(Robot.Turn) - Method in interface gui.Robot
Turn robot on the spot for amount of degrees.
rotateClockwise() - Method in enum class generation.CardinalDirection
Gives the direction that results from a 90 degree clockwise rotation applied to the current direction.
run() - Method in class generation.MazeBuilder
Main method to run construction of a new maze in a thread of its own.
run() - Method in class gui.SensorFailureAndRepairProcess
Thread for continually running the operation, breaking, and repair processes for the sensor in question
